item.title: Little Havana Food and Walking Tour in Miami
item.description: Experience the sights and sounds of Miami’s vibrant Little Havana neighborhood on this guided walking food tour. Explore this lively Cuban district and learn about its fascinating history and culture, with stops at some of the best family-owned and operated Cuban restaurants in the area. Sample the local cuisine, like guava pastries, chicken plantain cups, and flan ice cream, to name just a few of the delicacies offered along the way. Also, meet some of the local artists, watch skilled Cuban cigar rollers and listen to traditional Cuban music.

image.alt: Little Havana Food and Walking Tour in Miami

item.title: Little Toot Dolphin Adventure at Clearwater Beach
item.description: The Gulf of Mexico is known for wild dolphin sightings and this tour from Clearwater Beach helps you discover the pods. Climb aboard the Little Toot, a tugboat-style boat, that creates a big wake that dolphins like to play in. While you’re out on the water, enjoy lively commentary about the dolphins and the surrounding area.

image.alt: Little Toot Dolphin Adventure at Clearwater Beach

item.title: Clear Kayak Tour of Shell Key Preserve and Tampa Bay Area
item.description: Get out on the water and see Tampa Bay from a new perspective with this kayaking tour. Ride in a clear kayak—which has the advantage of greater visibility of the underwater world. Along the way look out for coastal birds, marine life, and the beautiful mangroves. No need to worry about missing out on photo opportunities—the trip includes photo stops and a break at Shell Key to enjoy its beach and sandbars.

image.alt: Clear Kayak Tour of Shell Key Preserve and Tampa Bay Area

item.title: Shell Island Snorkel and Dolphin Catamaran Cruise with Island Time
item.description: Cruise to Shell Island and search for wild dolphins on a catamaran sailing trip from Panama City Beach. The catamaran’s broad, stable deck makes it a comfortable alternative to smaller boats prone to rocking in the waves, and since it’s stocked with paddle boards, snorkeling gear, and a waterslide, it’s the perfect base for playing in the clear water off Shell Island.

image.alt: Shell Island Snorkel and Dolphin Catamaran Cruise with Island Time

item.title: Key West Sunset Sail with Full Bar, Live Music and Hors D'oeuvres
item.description: Watch the sun set and the moon rise off the coast of Key West on this sunset cruise. Enjoy the scenery and peaceful calm of a late afternoon sail aboard a 70-foot catamaran with plenty of deck space to stretch out and enjoy the breathtaking view. Then watch a legendary Key West sunset as the sun glistens and gently settles into the water. Hearty appetizers plus champagne, wine, full liquor bar, ice-cold beer and soft drinks are included.

image.alt: Key West Sunset Sail with Full Bar, Live Music and Hors D'oeuvres

item.title: Speedboat Sightseeing Adventure of Miami
item.description: Cruise the Miami coastline 'Miami Vice-style' on this speedboat cruise. Settle in to your plush seat as your expert captain pilots the speedboat down the sandy shoreline, where you can view Fisher Island and Star Island's collection of multi-millionaire and celebrity homes. Buzz by Miami Beach, where the locals strut their stuff in sun and you can snap photos of the Art Deco mansions lining South Beach.

image.alt: Speedboat Sightseeing Adventure of Miami

item.title: Manatee Sightseeing and Wildlife Boat Tour
item.description: See the gentle giants of the sea in their natural habitat on this Everglades wildlife tour. Climb aboard the covered boat and set out along the Florida waterways to spot manatees, alligators, sharks, birds, and more. Learn about the local ecosystem and wildlife from your Coast Guard-certified captain and keep your eyes peeled for manatees that sometimes come right up to the boat.

image.alt: Manatee Sightseeing and Wildlife Boat Tour

item.title: Shark and Wildlife Viewing Adventure in Key West
item.description: Get up close with sharks and other marine wildlife on this boat tour from Key West. Travel on board an eco-friendly, 34-foot catamaran just a few miles off the coast of Key West. See dolphins, stingrays, turtles and birds and learn about Key West’s waters, and then watch as the pilot drops bait to draw a variety of sharks right to the edge of the boat. Bring a camera to capture the excitement as these super predators swarm. Cold drinks, snacks and polarized sunglasses are included on this Key West shark cruise.

image.alt: Shark and Wildlife Viewing Adventure in Key West

item.title: Guided Bicycle Tour of Old Town Key West
item.description: Ride through the streets of Old Town Key West during a leisurely bicycle tour—a perfect introduction for first-time visitors. Learn about the island's history and see highlights such as Mallory Square, Mile Marker Zero, and White Street Pier. Pedal out to the Southernmost Point Buoy and enjoy panoramic ocean views. Plus, choose from morning or afternoon times to easily fit this tour into your schedule.

image.alt: Guided Bicycle Tour of Old Town Key West

item.title: Most Popular 3hr Manatee Swim Tour + In-Water Guide!
item.description: Swim with manatees on this nature-focused Crystal River tour. Appreciate these majestic animals in their natural habitat, under the watchful eye of an in-the-water guide who strives to ensure safe and respectful interactions between human and manatee at all times. Tours include snorkeling gear at no additional cost, and professional underwater photos are available for purchase after the tour.

image.alt: Most Popular 3hr Manatee Swim Tour + In-Water Guide!

item.title: Florida Everglades Airboat Tour and Wild Florida Admission with Optional Lunch
item.description: Escape to the wilderness of the Florida Everglades from Orlando on this airboat adventure. This exciting nature tour includes admission to the Wild Florida Airboats and Wildlife Park— with over 200 different animals like lemurs, sloths, zebras, watusi cattle, bobcats and more. Choose from two airboat durations and upgrade to the half-day tour and enjoy a delicious barbeque lunch at the Chomp House Grill, plus an alligator souvenir.

image.alt: Florida Everglades Airboat Tour and Wild Florida Admission with Optional Lunch

item.title: Rock Springs 2-Hour Glass Bottom Guided Kayak Eco Tour
item.description: A good choice for nature lovers, this tour takes you into a unique part of Rock Springs Run known as "Emerald Cut.” The first part of the tour is an upstream paddle through calm waters and overhead tree canopy, with stops to hop off your clear kayak and into the fresh spring water. Keep your eyes peeled for for fish, turtles, birds, small alligators, and more.

image.alt: Rock Springs 2-Hour Glass Bottom Guided Kayak Eco Tour

item.title: St. Augustine Ghost Tour: A Ghostly Encounter
item.description: Ideal for families, this ghost tour of St. Augustine’s spookiest sites combines light-hearted fun with spine-tingling tales of the city’s past. Alongside a costumed guide, you visit cemeteries, the ground of the Old Fort, and other haunted locations to discover the little-known legends that surround the romantic venue. This small-group tour is limited in order to maintain an atmosphere suitable for the ghost walk.

image.alt: St. Augustine Ghost Tour: A Ghostly Encounter

item.title: The 'OG' Manatee Snorkel Tour with In-Water Guide/Photographer
item.description: Get to know central Florida’s endangered manatees on this boat tour. Swim and snorkel with these gentle giants at the Crystal River National Wildlife Refuge, located in King’s Bay in the town of Crystal River — well known as the home of the manatee. Photos above and below the water will be taken throughout the tour and can be purchased afterward, if desired. Use of a mask, snorkel gear and wet suit, plus fees and beverages are included.

image.alt: The 'OG' Manatee Snorkel Tour with In-Water Guide/Photographer

item.title: Clearwater Encounters with Dolphins Tour
item.description: Dolphin encounters are quite common in the Gulf of Mexico, but this boat tour lets you get a closer look at them. Sail out towards Compass Island and keep your eyes peeled for the playful creatures while your captain provides commentary about your surroundings. Then, once you reach the island, jump in the water to search for marine life, collect shells, or simply enjoy the water.

image.alt: Clearwater Encounters with Dolphins Tour

item.title: Everglades Tour from Miami with Transportation
item.description: Escape to the wilderness of Everglades on this most of the time 4-5 hour small-group adventure from Miami. This exciting nature tour includes a narrated airboat ride through the unique ecosystem of the Florida Everglades. Enjoy the scenery, learn about the history and flora, and look for Florida’s abundant wildlife, like alligators, crocodiles, birds, fish, exotic snakes and more. The total 4-5 hour duration of this tour begins upon hotel pick-up.

image.alt: Everglades Tour from Miami with Transportation

item.title: Dolphin and Manatee Stand Up Paddleboard Tour in Daytona Beach
item.description: The manatee- and dolphin-rich waters off the coast of Daytona Beach beckon visitors out of their beach chairs. This half-day exploration seeks out these animals from the comfort of a stand-up paddleboard. Guides lead you under seven bridges, around an island, and through several scenic canals in search of wildlife. Tours are slow-paced and geared toward all ages and skill levels and take place in a calm bay.

image.alt: Dolphin and Manatee Stand Up Paddleboard Tour in Daytona Beach

item.title: Sarasota Guided Mangrove Tunnel Kayak Tour
item.description: Increase your chances of spotting manatees and dolphins during an eco-friendly kayak tour of the Lido Key in Sarasota. Ideal for lovers of nature and wildlife, this experience lets you escape the crowds on land and is suitable for both beginner and advanced paddlers. Plus, traveling in a non-motorized vessel means you’re less likely to scare away animals.

image.alt: Sarasota Guided Mangrove Tunnel Kayak Tour

item.title: Manatee Swim Tour with In Water Photographer
item.description: At Crystal River National Wildlife Refuge, you’ll find a truly unique experience: swimming with manatees. It’s the only spot in the world where you can hang with the gentle giants in their natural habitat, though you’ll want a guide to make sure you—and the manatees—have the best experience possible. With this tour, you’ll hop aboard a certified vessel with your in-water guide, snorkeling through the “Manatee Capital of the World.”

image.alt: Manatee Swim Tour with In Water Photographer

item.title: 2 hrs Miami Private Boat Tour with Cooler, Ice, Bluetooth Stereo
item.description: Discover Miami from the water with a private evening boat tour. Climb aboard a boat with private captain and set out into the bay for a scenic cruise. See the twinkling city skyline and local landmarks like Star Island during this after-dark tour. Customize the itinerary according to your interests and get to know Miami from a fresh perspective.

image.alt: 2 hrs Miami Private Boat Tour with Cooler, Ice, Bluetooth Stereo

item.title: Key West Mangrove Kayak Eco Tour
item.description: Paddle a kayak through mangrove creeks and shallow water on a Key West kayaking tour that offers an up-close look that this unique coastal environment. This guided tour is the perfect way to spot Florida wildlife in a natural habitat.

image.alt: Key West Mangrove Kayak Eco Tour

item.title: Historic Ybor City Food Walking Tour
item.description: This historic Ybor City food tour gives you a perfect introduction to the Tampa area by taking you to eateries to sample up to six food and drink tastings. A guide leads the way on foot telling you all about Ybor city history as you try food to see which restaurants you might want to go back to later during your stay in the city.

image.alt: Historic Ybor City Food Walking Tour

item.title: Dolphin and Manatee Adventure Tour of Fort Myers
item.description: Get up close and personal to Florida’s wildlife on a paddleboard tour through Fort Myers. Get your gear and slowly navigate the waterways in search of West Indian manatees, dolphins, sea turtles, pelicans, and many more species. Stop to search for seashells at a nearby beach and take in the coastal views before heading back to the launch point.

image.alt: Dolphin and Manatee Adventure Tour of Fort Myers

item.title: Medieval Torture Museum with Ghost Hunting and Tiny Art Gallery
item.description: Visit the Medieval Torture Museum and get the Ghost Hunting Experience and Tiny Art Gallery Admission with all inclusive package. You can enjoy all three activities at one visit.

image.alt: Medieval Torture Museum with Ghost Hunting and Tiny Art Gallery
